EmailTemplate.description: Send the "not entitled" rejection to the Customer
EmailTemplate.name: Entitlement Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Number__c}{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}{!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}{!Case.Product_Part__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Dear {!Case.Contact},
It is the policy of Honeywell to limit distribution of maintenance materials to only direct users of the supported prime equipment.
Thank you very much for your patience and consideration.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
